item.title: CVE-2020-36697|2024-08-04T17:37:06.636Z -- koenhuybrechts -- wp%20gdpr
item.description: The WP GDPR plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authorization bypass due to a missing capability check in versions up to, and including, 2.1.1. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete any comment and modify the pluginâ€™s settings.
